description: Initially serving along with his comrade Roberto as one of Quattro Bajeena`s wingmen, Apolly later goes on to become the chief of the AEUG flagship Argama`s Rick Dias team. Like Quattro, Apolly is a veteran soldier who can handle almost any combat situation. This solid team player provides our heroes with not only valuable support in battle, but also a much-needed dose of sardonic wit.
name: Apolly Bay
